content: linear: Concentrated on architectural definition and backlog management for `elizaos/eliza`, creating 9 issues to address security and performance. They scoped critical tasks such as implementing JWT authentication (#6327) and resolving a TOCTOU race condition in credit deduction (#6338). Additionally, they identified database optimizations, including UPSERT patterns (#6335) and specific SQL plugin fixes (#6340). This activity highlights a focus on system stability and technical planning over direct code contribution this month.
